jtorrent.tracker

Class JTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • jtorrent.tracker.JTracker

  • public class JTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Tracker that keeps track of torrent's and their swarm of peers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JTracker.PeerRef
      A class used by the server to reference a peer that is using this server.
      class  JTracker.TorrentRef
      A tracker's reference to a torrent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTorrent(Metainfo torrent)
      Adds a torrent to this tracker, called by either a socket announce handler or a RMI announce handler.

      Removes a torrent from this tracker.
      void start()
      Starts running the tracker server by listening for incoming client messages on both the socket and RMI interfaces.
      void stop()
      Stops the tracker server.

      • JTracker

        public JTracker(java.net.InetSocketAddress address)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new tracker server.
        Parameters:
        address - Socket address for the server to listen on.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If socket connection fails.

    • Method Detail

      • url

        public final java.lang.String url()
        Gets the full http url of this tracker server.
        Returns:
        URL formatted as http://ip:port/announce

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts running the tracker server by listening for incoming client messages on both the socket and RMI interfaces.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the tracker server.

      • addTorrent

        public void addTorrent(Metainfo torrent)
        Adds a torrent to this tracker, called by either a socket announce handler or a RMI announce handler.
        Parameters:
        torrent - Torrent

      • removeTorrent

        public JTracker.TorrentRef removeTorrent(java.lang.String hash)
        Removes a torrent from this tracker. called by either a socket announce handler or a RMI announce handler.
        Parameters:
        hash - SHA-1 hash of the torrent to be removed.
        Returns:
        Remove torrent.
